definition: to exchange love tokens or vows/to pledge one's love/to get engaged
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: It is believed that everyone may have a token for love and an episode.
sentences.chinese: 相信每个人手中的定情信物，都有一段故事。

sentences.english: That there's no such thing as love at first sight or first kiss.
sentences.chinese: 世界上没有一见钟情或一吻定情这种事。

sentences.english: Helps to stabilise mood swings, prevent ageing skin and reduce freckles.
sentences.chinese: 稳定情绪，展延肌肤老化和淡化或减少雀斑。

sentences.english: Keeping a positive perspective can help her stabilize her emotions.
sentences.chinese: 保持积极的态度，这可以帮助她稳定情绪。

sentences.english: You can purchase a token of affection.
sentences.chinese: 你能买份不错的定情信物。

sentences.english: Must think the blood pressure sets minds at rest must stabilize.
sentences.chinese: 要想血压稳定情绪必须稳定。

sentences.english: Dandelions were my way of giving them love and affection.
sentences.chinese: 蒲公英就是我跟她们谈情说爱时的定情物。

sentences.english: Rosewood stabilizes emotions and centers awareness.
sentences.chinese: 红木稳定情绪和中心意识。

sentences.english: After the rubberized tracks away her in public, a kiss to promise.
sentences.chinese: 结束后，林放当众拉走她，一吻定情。

definition: to make a pledge to be married, without parents' approval
to pledge eternal love (idiom)/to exchange marriage vows
to exchange vows with (sb)/to exchange vows at (a time or place)
good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
in love with/to feel deeply attached to

Qixi Festival or Double Seven Festival on the 7th day of the 7th lunar month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女[niu2 lang3 zhi1 nu:3] are allowed their annual meeting
variant of 訂婚|订婚[ding4 hun1]
